verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a Redeemer,
Jesus, God's own Son,
Precious Lamb of God, Messiah,
Ho - ly One.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Thank You, O my Father, for giving us Your Son
And leaving Your Spirit till the work on Earth is done

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus my Redeemer,
Name above all names,
Precious Lamb of God, Messiah,
O for sinners slain.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When I stand in glory,
I will see His face,
And there I'll serve my King forever,
In that holy place
